headline: Tinder will try AI-powered matching as the dating app continues to lose users
summary: Tinder hopes to reverse its ongoing decline in active users by turning to AI. In the coming quarter, the Match-owned dating app will roll out new AI-powered features for discovery and matching. The addition aims to offer fatigued singles an alternative to the "swipe" that defined the dating app in its earlier days and influenced an entire industry to adopt the gesture as the go-to standard. headline: Evercore cuts rating on Tinder parent Match Group stock
summary: Investing.com -- Evercore ISI downgraded Match Group Inc (NASDAQ:MTCH) to "In Line" from "Outperform," citing a weak first-quarter outlook and uncertainty surrounding its leadership transition, while maintaining its $35 price target.
